header.heading:
Kirill Ivanov
Frontend developer
header.text: I develop SPA and multi page apps made with React

section1.heading: My skills
section1.text1: I have 4 years of experience as a front-end developer in E-commerce. I participated in the development of online stores for such companies as Nespresso, L'oreal, AAG Estate.
section1.text2: Working on various projects, I implemented integration with Yandex Maps API via REST requests, worked on creating cross-browser and adaptive pixel perfect layouts using psd or figma, and also worked with ES5 and jQuery library.  Currently I only work with ES6+.

technologies.heading: Technologies that I use:
technologies.text1: I mainly use Javascript to develop the front end part of the application. I use React to quickly build a client-side of a website of any complexity and Redux as a way to manage app's state
technologies.text2: I work with Next.js to develop multi-page websites with full SEO support. Working with the API I prefer to use Graphql because of its convenience and simplicity. I often use the material-ui library as a mean to quickly and easily create adaptive components.
